node.productname: ChiRunning Jumpstart Package: Book, DVD, & Metronome
node.newshortdescriptions: Run injury-free with the revolutionary technique that makes running joyful and safe for beginning runners to seasoned marathoners. Package includes the ChiRunning book, DVD, and metronome.
node.longdescription:
"Running doesn’t have to be hard, and it doesn’t have to hurt. Whether you’re a seasoned runner in marathon training or you’re just getting started, ChiRunning will help you run with ease, energy and joy. Combine the inner focus and flow of T’ai Chi with running to develop a ground-breaking technique that takes the pain and injury out of running.
  • Learn how to run so it feels easy on your body
  • Prevent pain and injuries
  • Enrich your running practice and stay consistent
  • Run farther, faster, and easier with less effort
ChiRunning is the injury-free answer for all runners, whether you’re a beginner, a seasoned marathoner, or a triathlete. You can truly love running forever."
node.review1: "At age 76, I don't believe I could be doing this amount of running had I not discovered ChiRunning. Hopefully, I can continue for many more years of ChiRunning." Tom R.
node.review2: "I'm so grateful that you were able to discover this more natural and centered way to run, and generously share it with others. This is incredibly valuable to me as "preventative medicine", which will allow me to avoid future pain and injury by running with proper alignment and form." Vicky W.
node.featurebenefit1blurb: Learn how small adjustments in your movement can make a big difference in reducing impact, preventing injuries, and improving your running efficiency
node.featurebenefit2title: Make injuries a thing of the past
node.featurebenefit2blurb: Transform your body’s aches and pains by learning to adjust your technique
node.featurebenefit3blurb: Feel lighter on your feet, and run farther and faster with less recovery time
node.featurebenefit4blurb: Enrich your running practice to make it something you look forward to rather than a chore

node.newshortdescriptions: Lose weight, feel energized, and stay active for lifelong health. Learn how to make walking an effective, pain-free way to get fit.
node.longdescription:
The ChiWalking technique provides a revolutionary way to enjoy injury-free fitness walking. In this one-hour audio program, ChiWalking Creator and Founder Danny Dreyer introduces you to the ChiWalking Technique and gives you the tools to develop a fitness walking program for life.
  • Learn the basics of the ChiWalking technique
  • Personal audio guidance through an entire walk from the Founder of ChiWalking
  • Warm
  • up and cool
  • down techniques
node.review1: "I am proud to say that this is my 13th week and I have doubled the time I was walking and increased both speed. You have truly energized my life." Geri L.
node.review2: "I walked 50 minutes and it felt like 30 or less and no pain. I have a herniated disk and it felt great - all I can say is wow. I was afraid it might be too good to be true, but I proved myself wrong." Robin
node.featurebenefit1blurb: Learn how small adjustments in your movement can make a big difference in reducing impact, preventing injuries, and improving your walking efficiency
node.featurebenefit2title: Make injuries a thing of the past
node.featurebenefit2blurb: Transform your body’s aches and pains by learning to adjust your technique
node.featurebenefit3blurb: Feel lighter on your feet and walk farther and faster than ever before
node.featurebenefit4blurb: Enrich your walking practice to make it something you look forward to rather than a chore

node.newshortdescriptions: Get and stay fit with a safe and gentle approach to fitness! Package includes ChiWalk-Run Training Program, DVD, & Metronome
node.longdescription:
The Chi techniques combine the inner focus and flow of T’ai Chi with walking and running to create ground-breaking techniques that take the pain and injury out of fitness. You don’t need to know a thing about T’ai Chi for these techniques to work wonders for you. Save your knees, feel light on your feet, and enjoy your workouts.
  • Get daily workouts that keep you motivated and pain free
  • Take walk breaks to decrease fatigue while building endurance
  • Reduce impact* and prevent injuries so you can stay on the track to fitness
  • Burn fat, tone your muscles, and boost your energy
  • Look & feel better than ever!
node.review1: “I don’t have an excuse anymore. I love exercising and being healthy…I can only see my life improving from here.” Kristy C., Chi Walk-Run Enthusiast
node.review2: "I started reading ChiWalking hoping I wouldn’t fall asleep reading the book, but I stuck with it and read the focuses again, the 5 Mindful Steps for ChiWalking, etc., and I have begun to realize that a sound understanding of the principles of ChiWalking are what will make a great ChiRunner." Cheryl

Tomorrow I will put it into practice in my morning run and walk." Joseph C.

node.productname: ChiWalking Jumpstart Package: Book, DVD, & Metronome
node.newshortdescriptions: Learn to blend walking with the movement principles of T’ai Chi to create balance and strength, to improve overall health, and to manage stress. Package includes the ChiWalking book, ChiWalking DVD, and a metronome.
node.longdescription: Chi Walking combines the inner focus and flow of T’ai Chi with the healthfulness and energy of walking to create a ground-breaking technique that makes walking more enjoyable. Now available to purchase with the digital ChiWalking DVD, which allows immediate access to stream and download the .mp4 file directly to your computer to view on your devices! (Please note that the rest of your order will be shipped in 2 - 3 business days.) This package has the best tools for you to learn the Chi Walking method: the book explains ‘why’, the DVD shows ‘how’, and the metronome puts it all together to help you walk efficiently and with awareness.
node.review1: "My walking pace was faster and I felt as if I were gliding across the pavement rather than a heavy hard step each time." Allison
node.review2: "For two years I have always had pain when I was walking – the worst was going upstairs - and now I can walk free of pain. I can really recommend this walking style!" Else G.

node.review1: "During the past few years, my wife and I have become avid ChiWalkers – it’s been an invaluable and powerful journey. All in all, ChiWalking has become our science and our art – a magical way to walk – leading to a more mindful and healthy way to live. We recommend it to everyone whether or not they ever want to walk a marathon – ChiWalking works!" Jim & Sue M.
node.review2: "Yesterday I finished my first marathon! I accomplished this using the ChiWalking technique, with a few ChiRunning moments thrown in for good measure. The focuses helped me get through the tough parts, and when I got to the last few miles and I was exhausted, each step was a reminder to perfect my form, breathe completely, and gather my energy from the earth." Kimberly G.

node.longdescription:
Running doesn’t have to be hard, and it doesn’t have to hurt. Whether you’re a seasoned runner in marathon training or you’re just getting started, ChiRunning will help you run with ease, energy and joy. Combine the inner focus and flow of T’ai Chi with running to develop a ground-breaking technique that takes the pain and injury out of running.
  • Learn how to run so it feels easy on your body
  • Prevent pain and injuries
  • Enrich your running practice and stay consistent
  • Run farther, faster, and easier with less effort
ChiRunning is the injury-free answer for all runners, whether you’re a beginner, a seasoned marathoner, or a triathlete. You can truly love running forever.

node.newshortdescriptions: Learn to blend walking with the movement principles of T’ai Chi to create balance and strength, to improve overall health, and to manage stress.
node.longdescription:
ChiWalking transforms walking from a mundane means of locomotion into an intensely rewarding practice that delivers real results.
Walking has been proven to combat depression, high blood pressure, heart disease, Alzheimer’s, and many other diseases. ChiWalking keeps you from getting sidelined with pain and injuries so you can maximize these health benefits with a consistent fitness walking program.
ChiWalking DVD highlights:

node.newshortdescriptions: Enjoy the beauty and challenge of hills and trails with ease using the Hills & Trails DVD.
node.longdescription:
Eliminate the strain and struggle that can come with running hills and trails. Conserve energy, prevent injury, and enjoy the views from the top pain-free! The Hills & Trails DVD has two parts: Hills Made Easy and Trail Running. In the Hills Made Easy lessons, you’ll learn to: -Use less leg muscle and make uphill running easier -Run downhill with less impact while gaining speed -Prevent injury and over-exertion -Apply special techniques to steep hills
In the Trail Running lessons, you’ll learn: -Effective techniques to be a safe and efficient trail runner -Special tactics for steep trails, single-track and V-shaped trails -How to buy the best shoes for trail running
node.review1: "I am having a blast with Chirunning! I just ran for the first time a 18.6 mile race in California. I have been running for all my life as a sprinter and now close to 40 years old never could master distances over 3-5 miles. Now a 12 mile trail run." Christine G.
node.review2: "Yesterday, I did a long trail run that is about 1000' of climb and shaved off about 20 minutes! Pelvic rotation on the uphills with improved arm swing made all the difference! I was flying in 3rd gear on the downhills with such ease that I was just laughing with joy" Cheryl

node.newshortdescriptions: Run faster and farther with ease! Whether you’re a seasoned marathoner or you’ve never run a step, the ChiRunning DVD will help you run injury-free for life.
node.longdescription:
Laufen muss nicht hart sein und es muss nicht weh tun. Egal, ob Sie ein erfahrener Läufer im Marathontraining sind oder gerade erst anfangen, ChiRunning hilft Ihnen, mit Leichtigkeit, Energie und Freude zu laufen. Kombinieren Sie den inneren Fokus und Den Fluss von T'ai Chi mit dem Laufen, um eine bahnbrechende Technik zu entwickeln, die den Schmerz und die Verletzung beim Laufen nimmt.
  • Lernen Sie, wie man läuft, damit es sich für Ihren Körper angenehm anfühlt
  • Verhindern Sie Schmerzen und Verletzungen
  • Bereichern Sie Ihre Laufpraxis und bleiben Sie konsequent
  • Laufen Sie weiter, schneller und einfacher mit weniger
Aufwand ChiRunning ist die verletzungsfreie Antwort für alle Läufer, egal ob Anfänger, erfahrener Marathonläufer oder Triathlet. Du kannst das Laufen wirklich für immer lieben.
node.review1: "ChiRunning hat mir das Leben beim Laufen gerettet! Ich habe diesen Herbst zwei Marathons und freue mich jetzt so sehr auf mein Training."
node.review2: "Ich LIEBE diese Technik! Ich habe nie aufgehört, das zu benutzen, was ich gelernt habe. Ich hatte nie wieder eine ernsthafte Laufverletzung und konnte alle Schübe bewältigen, die ich hatte..."
node.featurebenefit1blurb: Erfahren Sie, wie kleine Anpassungen in Ihrer Bewegung einen großen Unterschied bei der Reduzierung von Auswirkungen, der Vorbeugung von Verletzungen und der Verbesserung Ihrer Laufeffizienz bewirken können
node.featurebenefit2title: Verletzungen der Vergangenheit angehören lassen
node.featurebenefit2blurb: Transformieren Sie die Schmerzen Ihres Körpers, indem Sie lernen, Ihre Technik anzupassen
node.featurebenefit3blurb: Fühlen Sie sich leichter auf den Beinen und laufen Sie weiter und schneller mit weniger Erholungszeit
node.featurebenefit4blurb: Bereichern Sie Ihre Laufpraxis, um es zu etwas zu machen, auf das Sie sich freuen, und nicht zu einer lästigen Pflicht
node.featurebenefit5title: Liebe es, fürs Leben zu laufen
node.featurebenefit5blurb: Entdecken Sie die Freude am Laufen neu

node.newshortdescriptions: Run faster and farther with ease! Whether you’re a seasoned marathoner or you’ve never run a step, the ChiRunning DVD will help you run injury-free for life.
node.longdescription:
Correr no tiene que ser difícil, y no tiene que doler. Ya sea que seas un corredor experimentado en el entrenamiento de maratón o que recién estés comenzando, ChiRunning te ayudará a correr con facilidad, energía y alegría. Combina el enfoque interno y el flujo de T'ai Chi con correr para desarrollar una técnica innovadora que elimine el dolor y la lesión de correr.
  • Aprende a correr para que se sienta fácil para tu cuerpo
  • Prevenir el dolor y las lesiones
  • Enriquezca su práctica de carrera y manténgase constante
  • Corre más lejos, más rápido y más fácil con menos esfuerzo
ChiRunning es la respuesta libre de lesiones para todos los corredores, ya seas un principiante, un maratonista experimentado o un triatleta. Realmente puedes amar correr para siempre.
node.review1: "¡ChiRunning me salvó la vida mientras corría! Tengo dos maratones este otoño y estoy deseando que llegue mi entrenamiento ahora".
node.review2: "¡Me encanta esta técnica! Nunca dejé de usar lo que aprendí. Nunca volví a tener una lesión grave al correr y pude hacer frente a todos los brotes que tuve..."
node.featurebenefit1blurb: Aprenda cómo los pequeños ajustes en su movimiento pueden marcar una gran diferencia en la reducción del impacto, la prevención de lesiones y la mejora de la eficiencia de su carrera.
node.featurebenefit2title: Hacer que las lesiones sean cosa del pasado
node.featurebenefit2blurb: Transforma los dolores y molestias de tu cuerpo aprendiendo a ajustar tu técnica
node.featurebenefit3blurb: Siéntase más ligero en sus pies y corra más lejos y más rápido con menos tiempo de recuperación
node.featurebenefit4blurb: Enriquezca su práctica de carrera para que sea algo que espera con ansias en lugar de una tarea

node.newshortdescriptions: Run faster and farther with ease! Whether you’re a seasoned marathoner or you’ve never run a step, the ChiRunning DVD will help you run injury-free for life.
node.longdescription:
Hardlopen hoeft niet moeilijk te zijn en het hoeft geen pijn te doen. Of je nu een doorgewinterde hardloper bent in marathontraining of net begint, ChiRunning helpt je met gemak, energie en plezier te rennen. Combineer de innerlijke focus en flow van T'ai Chi met hardlopen om een baanbrekende techniek te ontwikkelen die de pijn en blessure uit het hardlopen haalt.
  • Leer hardlopen zodat het gemakkelijk voelt voor je lichaam
  • Voorkom pijn en blessures
  • Verrijk je hardlooptraining en blijf consistent
  • Ren verder, sneller en gemakkelijker met minder inspanning
ChiRunning is het blessurevrije antwoord voor alle hardlopers, of je nu een beginner, een doorgewinterde marathonloper of een triatleet bent. Je kunt echt voor altijd van hardlopen houden.
node.review1: "ChiRunning heeft mijn leven gered tijdens het hardlopen! Ik heb dit najaar twee marathons en ik kijk nu zo uit naar mijn training."
node.review2: "Ik hou van deze techniek! Ik ben nooit gestopt met het gebruik van wat ik heb geleerd. Ik heb nooit meer een ernstige hardloopblessure gehad en kon alle opflakkeringen die ik had aan..."
node.featurebenefit1blurb: Ontdek hoe kleine aanpassingen in uw beweging een groot verschil kunnen maken bij het verminderen van impact, het voorkomen van blessures en het verbeteren van uw hardloopefficiëntie
node.featurebenefit2title: Blessures tot het verleden laten behoren
node.featurebenefit2blurb: Transformeer de pijntjes van je lichaam door te leren je techniek aan te passen

node.featurebenefit4blurb: Verrijk je hardloopoefening om er iets van te maken waar je naar uitkijkt in plaats van een klusje

node.longdescription: The ChiWalking Book & DVD package will teach you how to become a graceful, efficient walker in Five Mindful Steps.This best-seller is now available to purchase with the digital ChiWalking DVD, which allows immediate access to stream and download the .mp4 file directly to your computer to view on your devices! (Please note that the rest of your order will be shipped in 2-3 business days. The ChiWalking form emphasizes proper biomechanics of walking, based on principles borrowed from T’ai Chi, including: loosening joints, moving from one’s core muscles, and relaxing the peripheral muscles of the arms and legs.
node.review1: "I found myself walking at a good pace in a smooth and easy groove, falling in step with another pair of walkers, experienced marathoners, who expressed considerable interest in my ChiWalking technique and my personal goal given the minimal mileage base I had under my belt." Keith M
node.review2: "Using ChiWalking, my arthritis patients are able to walk farther, more frequently, and with less discomfort, than they were able to previously. In turn, their ability to do more exercise improves the strength in the legs and back, and helps retard further progression of the arthritis."

node.review1: "Thanks to the ChiRunning book and DVD I learned that the impact on my body was too much. But there is another thing that ChiRunning has given me which is even bigger to me. I have lost 15 kilo’s of extra weight that I have been carrying around for the last few years. I am now able to focus instantly and constantly because of the form focuses I do while I am running. ChiRunning has changed my life for the best. I am very grateful for this beautiful ‘tool’." Jose O.
node.review2: "In twenty months of running I not had so much as a twinge. After reading your book I’ve even kicked a 25 year dependency on orthotics. I’m completely sold on the advantages of ChiRunning."

node.review1: "I’m writing this message to thank you for your book ChiMarathon, which guided me through the process of preparing to my first marathon event. node.review2: "It was only around 2002/03 after a terribly painful experience in my first marathon that I finally let go of my attachments to "the old way" and started to Chi run full time. node.newshortdescriptions: This tiny tool produces huge results! Highly recommended for both runners and walkers.
node.longdescription:
Take the optimal number of strides each minute during your runs or walks and experience less fatigue, faster pace, and fewer injuries. Keeping a quick, consistent cadence with the metronome allows all the elements of the Chi techniques to fall into place, helping you move in a smooth, unified way. Become the most efficient runner or walker on the block with the metronome.
  • Reduce stress on leg joints and muscles
  • Get faster with less effort
  • Improve efficiency while reducing fatigue
  • Enjoy incredible “aha” moments as your technique transforms
  • Clips onto clothing; size: 2 1/4”L x 2”D x 1”W
  • Includes volume control, clock, memory function, and lithium battery
node.review1: “…I find the metronome to be the one thing that has helped me the most to progress in my running…” S.K. Sherman, Pennsylvania
node.review2: "I'm 62 and hate to think that my running days are behind me, as slow as I am. I really think the metronome forces you to fall into the correct form, because there is simply no time to get out of it. Peg S.

node.newshortdescriptions: Correct Toes help correct and prevent bunions, heel pain, and other common foot ailments. They are designed to be worn in shoes, so you can run, walk, hike, and stand in them.
node.longdescription:
Good technique starts with good alignment – from head to toe. Bunions, heel pain, and other common foot ailments can make running and walking with good technique difficult. Correct Toes are podiastrist-designed to place each toe in the correct anatomical position in relationship to each other and to the ground. By positioning your foot in the alignment nature intended, foot and joint problems are treated and avoided without surgery, orthotics, or medication. They’re designed for shoes, so you can wear them during any activity. With Correct Toes you can:
  • Enhance your balance and stability
  • Improve strength and flexibility
  • Increase circulation
  • Correct and prevent bunions, heel pain, and other common foot ailments

node.newshortdescriptions:
30 Minute Virtual Coaching Session
Private and virtual training sessions with Danny are scheduled through Acuity Scheduling. Click the Schedule button to schedule your session.
node.longdescription: Working with Danny is one of the best ways to master your technique! Whether you are following up from an in-person private session, Workshop or want some personal feedback from Danny, he's available to meet with you where ever you are virtually. How it works: Danny asks you send a video recording of yourself running (you'll receive directions on how to do so). Before your session, he'll review your form so he can provide feedback during your Lesson. You'll have the opportunity to ask any questions you may have and make the session unique to your needs!

node.longdescription: Working with Danny is one of the best ways to master your technique! Whether you are following up from an in-person private session, Workshop or want some personal feedback from Danny, he's available to meet with you where ever you are virtually. How it works: Danny asks you send a video recording of yourself running (you'll receive directions on how to do so). Before your session, he'll review your form so he can provide feedback during your Lesson. You'll have the opportunity to ask any questions you may have and make the session unique to your needs!
